responses.rationale: Factual reporting of a positive outcome ('reduced malaria') and study detail without explicit framing cues.
Contains explicit positive framing cue ('such a signal achievement') which prevents defaulting to Neutral.
Factual statement ('still work to do') and subjective evaluation ('very interesting') not meeting cue criteria.
Factual statement of uncertainty and a negative prediction stated as a personal opinion without amplification.
Subjective expression of doubt ('wish I could 100% buy into') not meeting cue criteria.
